data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Vanguard Press NY - 1955 - Condition: Very Good - Good - HBDJ, 1st Edition, 7TH printing, 1955, VG/GOOD-, AS-IS, minor rub & Numerous Tiny chips Tears extremities DJ, SMALL CHIP OUT BTM SPINE DJ , VG+/GOOD- WITH EDGE TEARS WEAR TO EXTREMITIES OF DJ, AS-IS, Black & pink decorated CLOTH Boards with rub, scuff extremities, Interior Nice, tight Light Wear FoX, 280 pgs , Edges rubbed; lightly askew. Tight and sound. The DJ in mylar is worn SMALL split . ; 8vo, PINK TOPSTAIN - Auntie Mame An Irreverent Escapade a Novel ( The author's scarce first book. ) SIGNED By Patrick Dennis IN PINK & B/W Illustrated Dustjacket. A young boy is orphaned at his aunts home, this is their adventures, ,GAY CAMP CLASSIC

Shipping Terms:

WE PACKAGE NICE & SECURE Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. California residents add 9.00% sales tax.
